name: souffle
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a light food that has a lot of air in it, is made mainly from eggs, and can be either sweet or savoury: a cheese soufflé a lemon soufflé
margouillatphotos/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesBake for 8 minutes or until the souffles have risen, but are still gooey in the centre.My husband liked the dressing with his double-baked crab soufflé so much that he asked what was in it.
